metadata.description: Collection of Claude Code plugins for productivity, notifications, and project management

plugins.name: notifications
plugins.description: Desktop notifications with TTS audio and beeps on session events

plugins.name: task-master
plugins.description: Specification-driven task management with agents, skills, and progress tracking

plugins.name: mcp-servers
plugins.description: Pre-configured MCP server definitions (30 servers for databases, APIs, browsers, etc.)

plugins.name: permission-sync
plugins.description: Synchronize Claude Code permissions across all your projects

plugins.name: knowledge-sync
plugins.description: Sync agents, skills, commands, and docs from external knowledge repository

plugins.name: session-tools
plugins.description: Session diary and reflection tools with pre-compact hooks

plugins.name: claude-initializer
plugins.description: Initialize projects with CLAUDE.md, settings templates, and brand configuration
